description:
Race and I spent hours doing this shoot...maybe four!
He's so easy going, loves to have sex, and eager to do fun stuff, that I think the fantasy "flashes" probably take up about half the film.
Don't get too used to it. Remember, these vids are to help ease the guys into "more" and most of the guys are really uptight to do anything more than getting their dick sucked.
Race obviously has few boundaries as you have seen him on the site already in full throttle action.
So I was eagerly awaiting this shoot.
I hope you will all will enjoy this final installment in this weekends marathon of Edge videos!
title: Bryan & Race - Edge
